state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, make an attempt to venture west. With that done, head south. And then, go east. And then, make an attempt to venture east. If you can do that, attempt to move east. After that, try to go to the north. Okay, and then, head west. Then, attempt to head south. Following that, try to venture south. After that, take a trip west. Okay, and then, make an effort to venture south. And then, make an effort to move south. Once you get around to doing that, go to the south. Then, make an effort to move west. Next, lift the coin from the floor of the dish-pit. Got that? Good! -= Steam Room =- Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a steam room. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Steam Room =-0/1
